title: Draven's time to shine. (SG Contest)
body:
STAR GUARDIAN DRAAAAVEN

Axe to throat, it's time to gloat!
Cas' damn I'm good at what I do

Stroke my hair, without a care!
Though recently I’m feeling blue

Each fool I slice, is worth a price
The crowd they’re bored of the same routine.

I love the gold, but truth be told.
I love the sweet sound of the guillotine!

I need a plan, to please the fans!
I live off fame and glory!

A brand new style, adds to the pile
Of pages that tell of my story!

Pool party’s a bust, and beast killin too!
Primetime was a hit now it's gone

A new day has arrived, and so i'm revived
As a star guardian im reborn!

The crowds in awe, and they want more!
Of the hottest new star in the squad!

This outfits legit, my style just can't quit
Mr popular here, I'm a god!

Catch me on the screen, I’ll be lookin so clean
As we fight for justice all the same!

Though between you and me, lets hope no one see’s
I'm only in it for the fame.
